items.sentence: Tom hoped that he hadn't made a bad first impression.
You can probably learn how to do that in three hours.

I don't understand why pepperoni pizza is so popular.

Tom tried his best to forget about what had happened.
Tom suddenly realized that the attraction was mutual.
